trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Billings
There were no other sightings in Billings on or around
Summary: 3 separate events, each in a different location, all blue-green fireballs
divs: sighting detailsi used to be a long-haul trucker. all events occurred in the middle of the night, years ago when people were reporting blue-green fast moving fireballs. the brightness in each case was approximate to 1\3 of a full moon. the first one i saw was in billings, montana, going from east to west. the second, white sands missile range, zig-zagging from north to south. the third, i-80 near the nebraska-iowa border, going from west to east. i heard a plasma physics expert on c2c say it is a new plasma sphere weapon fired from the back of a cargo plane, and it is supposedly guided by a maser beam(microwave instead of photons). another fellow on c2c said it was a friendly alien spacecraft, so choose whichever disinformation you want to believe. who knows?
